Nightstrike:

"Sorry, my master"said Nightstrike "But I can't understand... Do you 
have other way to... annoy our enemies?... "

--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Yes, he liked this robot a lot. "You miss the big picture 
Nightstrike.
> We did not lose, we have one today, little do the Maximals realise,
> mwhaa ha ha ha" He began to chuckle to himself.
